trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and enables object sharing between applications.
trans-unit.target: Gir base implementering for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> grensesnittet og aktiverer objektet deling mellom apper.

trans-unit.source: Component is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten er basisklasse for alle komponentene i common language runtime formidle som referanse.

trans-unit.source: Component is remotable and derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten er kan fjernstyres og er avledet fra <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>klassen.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: Component provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten inneholder en implementering av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> provides an implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> that marshals by value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>gir en implementering av <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>som marshals etter verdi.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: You can host a Component in any object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface, and you can query and get services from its container.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilby en komponent i et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>grensesnittet, og du kan spørre og få tjenester fra beholderen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The container creates an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> for each Component it contains.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen oppretter en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>for hver komponent den inneholder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The container uses the site to manage the Component and is used by the Component to communicate with its container.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen bruker området til å behandle komponenten og brukes av komponenten til å kommunisere med beholderen.

trans-unit.source: A Component should release resources explicitly by calls to its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En komponent skal frigi ressurser eksplisitt ved kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metoden uten å vente på automatisk minne administrasjon ved hjelp av en implisitt kall til den <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> is disposed, all components within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> are also disposed.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>er fjernet, alle komponentene i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>også er fjernet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om komponenten kan opprette en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne egenskapen alltid returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>klassen må overstyre denne egenskapen for å gir deg muligheten til å deaktivere opprettet av hendelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>class, hvis kontrollen ligger som en ActiveX-kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A>returnerer `false` hvis ActiveX-kontrollen har sine hendelser som er låst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component can raise events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis komponenten kan øke hendelser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: Komponentene i en beholder registreres i en første-modulen for First liste, som definerer også rekkefølgen på komponentene i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The last component added is the last component in the list.
trans-unit.target: Den siste komponenten legges til, er den siste komponenten i listen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, hvis aktuelt, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> ikke innkapslet i en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> er i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The design mode indicator is stored in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; therefore, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Utformingen-modus er lagret i det <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; derfor hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>har ikke en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>tilknyttet, verdien for denne egenskapen er `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> i utformingsmodus; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>ble bruker.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*> method.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når komponenten er fjernet av et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: When you create a Disposed delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en fjernet representant, må du identifisere metoden som behandler hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representantene [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over hendelsesbehandling som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref> that provides the delegates for this component.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"> </xref> som gir representantene for komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-koden kan ikke kalle denne metoden. et objekts `Finalize` metode startes automatisk under datasanering, med mindre finalization av saneringsoppsamlingen er deaktivert av et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> or by its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som representerer en tjeneste fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> eller ved den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tjeneste fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not provide the specified service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer en tjeneste fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> leverer ikke tjenesten.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> will have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Hvis den er lagt til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>tilordner en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>til det.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> is responsible for assigning the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>Er ansvarlig for å tilordne den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> does not necessarily change the name of the site the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for komponentens <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>ikke nødvendigvis endres ikke navnet på området i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>er tilordnet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The Site property should be set only by an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen området kan bare angis av <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The property value is `null` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is removed from its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er `null` Hvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>fjernes fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne `null` for denne egenskapen ikke nødvendigvis fjerner den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> might or might not have a name.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>kan eller kan ikke ha et navn.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name must be unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>er angitt et navn, navnet må være unike blant andre <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objekter i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>; therefore, you can only name a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> if it has an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Lagrer navnet på den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>derfor som du kan bare kalle en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>Hvis den har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>tilknyttet det.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>, the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not have an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with it, or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is removed from its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> ikke innkapslet i en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> har ikke en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> tilknyttet, eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> fjernes fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, eventuell.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan ikke overstyres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>kan eller kan ikke ha et navn.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>er angitt et navn, navnet er unike blant andre <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objekter i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Lagrer navnet på <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>kan bare ha en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Hvis den er lagt til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>tilordner en <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>til det.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, hvis aktuelt, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> er uten navn.</xref:System.String>
